name: Template
format:
<style>
    .automode {
        font-size: 24px;
        color: grey;
        /* display: none; */
    }
    .default-temperature, .default-humidity {
        font-size: 20px;
    }
    .default-temperature .value, .default-humidity .value {
        font-size: 32px;
    }
    
    .reset-button > button > span {
        font-size: 20px;
    }

    .mode-toggle {
        font-size: 25px;
    }

    #Welcome_Login,
#Welcome_Signup{
    margin-top: 6rem !important;
}

.welcome-text{
    font-weight: 650;
}

.loginform, .signupform{
    margin: 0.5rem auto !important;
    max-width: 25rem;
    position: absolute !important;
    top: 20% !important;
    left: 33.5% !important;
    /* margin-top: 0.5rem !important; */
}

.loginform [type=submit],
.signupform [type=submit]{
    max-width: 10rem;
    max-height: 3rem;
    line-height: 3rem !important;
}

.createacc-button{
    max-width: 10rem;
    max-height: 3rem;
    position: absolute !important;
    top: 75% !important;
    left: 43% !important;
}

.back-button{
    max-width: 10rem;
    max-height: 3rem;
    position: absolute !important;
    top: 75% !important;
    left: 43% !important;
}

.logout-button{
    max-width: 8rem !important;
    max-height: 3rem;
    line-height: 3rem !important;
    position: absolute !important;
    top: 2rem !important;
    left: 68rem !important;
}

.humidchart{
    margin-left: 6rem !important;
}

.humidchart,
.tempchart{
    margin-top: 6rem !important;
}

.nr-dashboard-ui_statetrail{
    top: 40rem !important;
}

.label_rainchart{
    top: 40rem !important;
    font-weight: 500;
    height: 3rem !important;
}

#Dashboard_Account_cards{
     margin-top: 0rem !important;
     margin-bottom: 0rem !important;
}
</style>
